summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from April 2020 discussing coordination between case teams on the Epstein case and another case. An Assistant Special Agent in Charge requests a spreadsheet of remaining electronic materials to be searched and estimates for completion.

persons.name: A. J.
persons.role: Assistant Special Agent in Charge, FBI New York
persons.context: Author of the core request email, asking for coordination between case teams on the Epstein case and another case to track electronic materials.

events.title: FBI coordination request on Epstein case materials
events.description: An Assistant Special Agent in Charge sends an email requesting the case teams for the Epstein case and another case to coordinate, create a spreadsheet of remaining electronic materials to be searched, and provide completion estimates.

keyFacts: The document is an internal FBI email from April 2020, showing the Epstein investigation was still active at that time.
An FBI Assistant Special Agent in Charge requests coordination between the Epstein case team and another case team regarding electronic evidence.
The request is for a spreadsheet detailing remaining electronic materials to be searched and estimates for when the work will be completed.
The email chain indicates the FBI was managing multiple priority cases, including the Epstein case.
The document reference EFTA00147095 and EFTA00147096 suggests it is part of a larger set of case files.
